register.tnc.label.1: Sign up Mediacorp VizPro e-newsletter, get updates and exclusive promotions!
register.tnc.check.1: By signing up VizPro e-newsletter, I consent to the use of my personal data by MediaCorp and the MediaCorp group of companies (collectively “MediaCorp”) to send me marketing and advertising materials in relation to goods and services of MediaCorp and its business partners, and for research and analysis.
register.tnc.main: I agree that SISTIC may collect my personal data both in its own capacity, and as ticketing agent and data imtermediary of promoters and venue managers of events for which I purchase tickets. My personal data may be collected, used, processed and disclosed by SISTIC, its agents and the above parties in accordance with SISTIC'™s Privacy Policy. I further confirm that all information provided is accurate and complete.
register.subscriptions.paragraph.content: Stay on top of the latest entertainment news and be the first to know what events and shows are happening near you. You can choose to get your feeds from us, our show organisers or the event venues. Or better yet, sign up for all three. You can unsubscribe at any time.
You will receive the SISTIC Buzz, a fortnightly newsletter featuring a comprehensive list of events ticketed through us.
update.account.title: MY ACCOUNT
login.error.email.invalid: Your email address is in an incorrect format. Please enter a valid email.
login.popup.reset.link.sent_template:
We have sent the link to reset your password to {{registerMail}}.

Please contact us if you do not receive it within the next few minutes at +65 6348 5555 or feedback@sistic.com.sg
login.register.email.error.409._2: email address is already in our system. If you have forgotten your password, please click on the Retrieve Password button.

shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.LIMIT: Only 10 E-voucher can be applied per Transaction, Please remove the extra e-voucher(s) and try again
shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.NON_EXIST: sorry, your evoucher does not exist in our records. Please check and try entering your eVoucher again
shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.VALIDATION_BASIC_FAIL: sorry, your evoucher does not exist in our records. Please check and try entering your eVoucher again
shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.VALIDATION_BASIC_REDEEMED: I'm sorry, this eVoucher has already been redeemed. Please contact the SISTIC Hotline at (65) 6348 5555 if you have not redeemed this previously.
shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.VALIDATION_VIOLATE_OWNERSHIP: Patron account number doesn't match with patron account number of E-Voucher
shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.VALIDATION_RULE_REDEEM_RESTRICTIONS_WITH: E-Voucher cannot be used, E-Voucher Payment method is not configured in Event/Product and User Profile
shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.VALIDATION_RULE_REDEEM_RESTRICTIONS_OUTS: E-Voucher cannot be used, Only E-Voucher Payment method that is not found in Event/Product and User Profile can be used
shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.VALIDATION_RULE_REDEEM_RESTRICTIONS_ALL_: E-Voucher cannot be used or redeemed due the Restrict-All rules applied to it
shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.VALIDATION_RULE_USAGE_WITH_OTHER_VOUCHER: Only 1 E-Voucher can be applied per Transaction. Please remove the extra e-voucher(s) and try again.
shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.VALIDATION_RULE_MAX_QTY_FAIL: Only 1 E-Voucher can be applied per Transaction. Please remove the extra e-voucher(s) and try again.
shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.VALIDATION_RULE_ALLOWED_PM_FAIL: E-Voucher can not be used with this payment method
shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.VALIDATION_RULE_CC_FAIL: E-Voucher cannot be used with this Credit Card
shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.VALIDATION_RULE_PASS: Pass (eVoucher passed all rules that are applied for it).
shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.EVOUCHER_TYPE_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: The E-Voucher rule is not implemented
shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.VALIDATION_RULE_ORG_FAIL: Organization ID of E-Voucher doesn't match with Organization ID of rule
shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.VALIDATION_RULE_USAGE_WITH_OTHER_VOUCHER: Only 1 OCBC E-Voucher can be applied per Transaction. Note: OCBC E-Vouchers does not work with other vouchers. If you wish to use other E-Vouchers, please remove the OCBC E-Voucher
shopping.cart.evoucher.validation.messag.VALIDATION_RULE_MAX_QTY_FAIL.OCBC_E_VOUC: Only 1 OCBC E-Voucher can be applied per Transaction. Note: OCBC E-Vouchers does not work with other vouchers. If you wish to use other E-Vouchers, please remove the OCBC E-Voucher

evoucher.full.redemption.notification.me: Your tickets are fully redeemed with your eVouchers. Please note that you are not allowed to select ticket protector and no refunds will be given for any excess value. No payment is required for this transaction, please proceed to confirm order.
error.generic: There was a system error, please refresh and try again or call (65) 6348 5555
error.shopping.cart.postcommit.fail: An error has occurred and we are unable to process your payment. Please try again or call the SISTIC Hotline at (65) 6348 5555 for assistance.
general.error.message: An error has occured. Please try again.
error.paymentgateway.amex.fail: An error has occurred while processing this card
error.paymentgateway.internalserver: An error has occurred and we are unable to process your payment. Please try again or call the SISTIC Hotline at (65) 6348 5555 for assistance.
error.payment.err.failed.txn3: Transaction Declined - No Reply from Bank
error.payment.err.failed.txn6: Transaction Declined - Error Communicating with Bank
error.payment.err.failed.txn8: Transaction Declined - Transaction Type Not Supported
error.payment.err.failed.txn9: Bank declined transaction (Do not contact Bank)
error.payment.err.failed.txnD: Deferred transaction has been received and is awaiting processing
error.payment.err.failed.txnL: Shopping Transaction Locked (Please try the transaction again later)
error.payment.err.failed.txnP: Transaction has been received by the Payment Adaptor and is being processed
error.payment.err.failed.txnR: Transaction was not processed - Reached limit of retry attempts allowed
error.payment.err.failed.txnV: Address Verification and Card Security Code Failed
error.payment.err.failed.3ds1: 3DS not supported or there was no 3DS data provided
error.payment.err.failed.3dsU: The cardholder’s Issuer was unable to authenticate due to some system error at the Issuer.
error.payment.err.failed.3dsF: There was an error in the format of the request from the merchant.
error.payment.err.failed.3dsA: Authentication of your Merchant ID and Password to the ACS Directory Failed.
error.payment.err.failed.3dsD: Error communicating with the Directory Server.
error.payment.err.failed.3dsS: The signature on the response received from the Issuer could not be validated.
cart.payment.scb.no-waive.label: The event(s) that you have selected is/are not participating in the SISTIC booking fee waiver promotion with Standard Chartered. Booking fee of {{fee}} will be charged accordingly.
cart.payment.scb.full-waive.label: Your total SISTIC booking fee of {{fee}} is waived, courtesy of Standard Chartered MasterCard Card! Full details of your final bill will be reflected in the confirmation email.
cart.payment.scb.partial-waive.label: Part of your purchase qualifies for a SISTIC booking fee waiver of {{fee}}, courtesy of Standard Chartered MasterCard Card! Full details of your final bill will be reflected in the confirmation email.
cart.subscription.title: Subscription
cart.subscription.text: I wish to receive marketing information by email from, and agree to the collection, use and disclosure of my personal data for such marketing by:
cart.subscription.item.03.chk: Venue Manager(s) for the event(s) purchased
cart.tnc.title: Conditions of Sale, Use of Personal Data:
cart.tnc.accept.chk: I have read and accept SISTIC Terms & Conditions of Sale and consent to:
cart.tnc.list.01: the collection of my personal data by SISTIC both in its own capacity, and as ticketing agent and data intermediary of the promoter(s) and venue manager(s) of the event(s) purchased; and
cart.tnc.list.02: the collection, use and disclosure of such personal data by SISTIC, its agents and the promoter(s) and venue manager(s) ,
cart.tnc.last.text: in accordance with SISTIC's Privacy Policy. No refund or exchange of tickets is allowed once your booking is confirmed.
cart.confirm.title: Confirm Order
cart.confirm.text: Please click OK to proceed with the payment and wait for your confirmation page to be displayed. You will also receive a booking confirmation via email after a successful transaction.
cart.confirm.payment-queue.text: You are now in the payment queue
cart.confirm.erroror.invalid-cc-for-paym: Invalid credit card for payment method
cart.confirm.incomplete.popup.title: Incomplete Fields
cart.confirm.incomplete.popup.text: Please complete the field(s) highlighted in red:
cart.confirm.incomplete.tnc.popup.error: Please accept SISTIC's Conditions of Sale & Use of Data to continue.
cart.confirm.incomplete.blockno.popup.er: Block No. / Hse No. / Street Name
cart.confirm.incomplete.ticket-protector: Please choose if you would like to include Ticket Protector coverage for your tickets.
cart.payment.invalid-card.error: We are unable to process your payment. Please ensure that your credit card number and/or expiry date is correct. If this problem persists, please call the SISTIC Hotline at (65) 6348 5555 for assistance.
cart.payment.wrong-card.error: You have chosen to collect your tickets with the Free MasterCard Pickup. Please ensure that you are making payment by MasterCard.
cart.payment.queue.label: You are now in the payment queue
cart.payment.queue.error.title: Error
cart.payment.queue.error.text: There was an error while waiting in the queue. Please try again or contact (65) 6348 5555 for futher assistance.
cart.confirm.redirect.text: Your credit card is protected by a highly secure authentication system (3-D Secure). To ensure the security of your online booking transaction, verification checks are currently being carried out by your card issuer. Your patience is appreciated.
cart.confirm.redirect.fail-steps.item.01: If redirection does not occur in 10 seconds, please do not close this browser. Follow the steps below to proceed with your payment.
cart.confirm.redirect.fail-steps.item.02: Click the Shopping Cart tab at the top of the webpage.
cart.confirm.redirect.fail-steps.item.03: If the tickets selected are displayed in the shopping cart, click the "Proceed to Payment" button to complete your transaction.
error.expires.popup.title: Sorry! Time limit exceeded!
error.expires.popup.text: You have exceeded the 15 minute time limit to complete this booking. Please try again.
cart.countdown.label: Time left to complete purchase
cart.post-commit.error: An error has occurred and we are unable to process your payment. Please try again or call the SISTIC Hotline at (65) 6348 5555 for assistance.

patron.subscriptions.main.title: Be the first in line.
patron.subscriptions.main.content: Stay on top of the latest entertainment news and be the first to know what events and shows are happening near you. You can choose to get your feeds from us, our show organisers or the event venues. Or better yet, sign up for all three. You can unsubscribe at any time.
patron.subscriptions.main.checkbox.label: Check the boxes to receive updates from:
patron.subscriptions.tenant.content: By signing up VizPro e-newsletter, I consent to the use of my personal data by MediaCorp and the MediaCorp group of companies (collectively “MediaCorp”) to send me marketing and advertising materials in relation to goods and services of MediaCorp and its business partners, and for research and analysis.
patron.subscriptions.tenant.includes.tex: Online promotions with prizes waiting to be won
patron.subscriptions.tenant.includes.lab: More than 500,000 people read SISTIC Buzz, so don't miss out!
In addition, SISTIC may also send you information on exciting events, promotions and other related products and services offered by show organisers or reputable third parties.
